title: Accidently disenchanted project: Lucian skin shard
body: On the evening of 2016/08/09 about 11:25p.m. I just accidently disenchanted project: Lucian skin shard. I meant to make it permanent. It is one of my favourite skins that I wanna get. I was really excited when I got the skin shard. However, accidently disenchanted it make me really upset. Riot please help me, I am a big fan of LOL. Can you please refund the skin shard for me please? please please please thank you a lot!!!

replies.body:
Hey there,

First off, apologies for the delayed response.

Your best bet in this situation as it's an account specific issue would be to [submit a ticket to Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) if you haven't done so already.

If you have, please refrain from adding additional info to your ticket or "Bumping" your ticket unnecessarily as this will push you to the back of the queue and delay a response even further.
